meaningMnemonic:
If you're <kanji>tired</kanji> by all the <kanji>evil</kanji> things in your life you might die of <vocabulary>exhaustion</vocabulary>!

While 疲労 and 疲れ mostly refer to physical or mental fatigue, 疲弊 describes being depleted and exhausted due to prolonged stress, overwork, or long-term difficulties. As a result, it can also be used to describe economic or financial exhaustion.
